body.p: Hancock County, Kentucky, blacksmith. Scotland native. Married Margaret Hardy. Father of Mary J. Hardy, Eliza A. Hardy, Margaret Hardie, and Adam Hardy. Blacksmith in Lower St. Clair Township, Pennsylvania, in 1850. Blacksmith in Hancock County, Kentucky, in 1860.
